name: Flutter Web Dev (manual)
postCreateCommand: bash -lc 'set -e; sudo apt-get update -y && sudo apt-get install -y git curl unzip xz-utils libglu1-mesa clang cmake ninja-build pkg-config libgtk-3-dev liblzma-dev; mkdir -p /workspaces/.flutter && if [ ! -d /workspaces/.flutter/.git ]; then git clone https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git -b stable /workspaces/.flutter; fi; echo "export PATH=/workspaces/.flutter/bin:\$PATH" >> ~/.bashrc; export PATH=/workspaces/.flutter/bin:$PATH; flutter --version; flutter config --enable-web; flutter pub get'
